name: Marilith
damage_resistances: cold, fire, lightning; damage from nonmagical weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The marilith makes six attacks with its longswords.

actions.name: Longsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Tail
bonus_actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) bludgeoning damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 19).

bonus_actions.name: Teleport
bonus_actions.desc: The marilith magically teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

reactions.name: Reactive Teleport
reactions.desc: When the marilith is hit or missed by a ranged attack, it uses Teleport. If it teleports within 5 feet of a creature, it can attack with its tail.

special_abilities.name: Chaotic Evil
special_abilities.desc: The marilith radiates a Chaotic and Evil aura.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The marilith has advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.
